rawtext.text: §cThis is you personal tool for Warping, Settings, and information! This can't be removed from you inventory.
§fWelcome to the Infohub! Take a look around!§r
§bYou are adding progress to you diamond quest! §cNote, once you get close to finishing a level you may have to switch to adding a lower amount of §bdiamond/s§c at a time

commands: /execute @initiator[scores={diamondq=1000..}] ~~~ tellraw @s {"rawtext":[{"text":"§l§eYou have fully completed this quest!§r"}]}
/execute @initiator ~~~ tellraw @s[scores={diamondq=991..},hasitem={item=diamond,quantity=10..}] {"rawtext":[{"text":"§r§l§cPlease Use a Lower Quanity, §aYou are approaching the next level!§r"}]}

/execute @initiator ~~~ tellraw @s[tag=dquest1,tag=dquest2,tag=dquest3,tag=dquest4,tag=!dquest5,scores={diamondq=491..},hasitem={item=diamond,quantity=10..}] {"rawtext":[{"text":"§r§l§cPlease Use a Lower Quanity, §aYou are approaching the next level!§r"}]}

/execute @initiator ~~~ tellraw @s[tag=dquest1,tag=dquest2,tag=dquest3,tag=!dquest4,tag=!dquest5,scores={diamondq=191..},hasitem={item=diamond,quantity=10..}] {"rawtext":[{"text":"§r§l§cPlease Use a Lower Quanity, §aYou are approaching the next level!"}]}

/execute @initiator ~~~ tellraw @s[tag=dquest1,tag=dquest2,tag=!dquest3,tag=!dquest4,tag=!dquest5,scores={diamondq=141..},hasitem={item=diamond,quantity=10..}] {"rawtext":[{"text":"§r§l§cPlease Use a Lower Quanity, §aYou are approaching the next level!"}]}

/execute @initiator[scores={diamondq=1000..}] ~~~ tellraw @s {"rawtext":[{"text":"§l§eYou have fully completed this quest!§r"}]}

/execute @initiator[scores={diamondq=1000..}] ~~~ tellraw @s {"rawtext":[{"text":"§l§eYou have fully completed this quest!§r"}]}

/execute @initiator ~~~ tellraw @s[tag=!dquest1,tag=!dquest2,tag=!dquest3,hasitem={item=diamond,quantity=100..},tag=!dquest4,tag=!dquest5] {"rawtext":[{"text":"§r§l§cPlease Use a Lower Quanity for This Level!"}]}

/execute @initiator ~~~ tellraw @s {"rawtext":[{"text":"§aFull Bright is active for §c15 minutes"}]}
